title: Shok Ultra 3 In 1
long_description: SHOK ULTRA 3 IN 1 is a pre-measured shock treatment that actively eliminates organic waste and maintains water clarity in a single weekly treatment. This re-activating treatment restores waterâ€™s sparkle while prolonging the effect of chlorine.
short_description: BENEFITS Eliminates organic waste Maintains water clarity FORMATS Pouch of 300 g and 600 g

characteristics.title: Application Method
characteristics.text: Sprinkle SHOK ULTRA 3 IN 1 directly over the surface of the water while walking around the pool.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Maintain daily levels as directed on the label of the pool sanitizer used and as determined by test kit. Put filter in filtration mode. For each treatment, add 300 g of SHOK ULTRA 3 IN 1 per 40,000 L of water according to the application method. Wait 30 minutes before using the pool.

dosage.specifications: One pouch of 300 g treats up to 40,000 L of pool water. Use SHOK ULTRA 3 IN 1 weekly to keep water crystal clear.

warning: Compatible with salt systems. DO NOT apply the product at the same time as adding salt. Wait for salt to dissolve completely before adding SHOK ULTRA 3 IN 1. DO NOT apply the product when people are in the pool. DO NOT use with products containing calcium hypochlorite; may cause explosion.
